entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
